name: @animal_warper
author: AFNI Developers
description: Align a subject structural dataset to a template and perform several post-alignment operations

inputs.description: input dataset to align to base template
inputs.name: Input File

inputs.description: base dataset (template) to align with
inputs.name: Base Template

inputs.description: output directory where all processing will be performed
inputs.name: Output Directory

inputs.description: provide a brainmask in the base template space
inputs.name: Brainmask

inputs.description: one or more atlas datasets in the base volume space
inputs.name: Atlas Datasets

inputs.description: one or more atlas datasets in the base volume space
inputs.name: Atlas Followers

inputs.description: one or more segmentation datasets in the base volume space
inputs.name: Segmentation Followers

inputs.description: one or more datasets in the template volume space
inputs.name: Template Followers

inputs.description: one or more datasets in the input volume space
inputs.name: Dataset Followers

inputs.description: one or more (int-valued) datasets in the input volume space
inputs.name: ROIDSET Followers

inputs.description: specify abbreviation for input dataset
inputs.name: Input Abbreviation

inputs.description: specify abbreviation for base dataset
inputs.name: Base Abbreviation

inputs.description: specify an abbreviation for each atlas follower dataset
inputs.name: Atlas Abbreviations

inputs.description: specify an abbreviation for each template follower dataset
inputs.name: Template Abbreviations

inputs.description: specify an abbreviation for each segmentation follower dataset
inputs.name: Segmentation Abbreviations

inputs.description: specify an abbreviation for each dataset follower dataset
inputs.name: Dataset Abbreviations

inputs.description: specify an abbreviation for each ROI dataset follower dataset
inputs.name: ROI Dataset Abbreviations

inputs.description: center alignment method to use
inputs.name: Align Centers Method

inputs.description: alignment movement options for affine alignment step
inputs.name: Affine Move Options

inputs.description: cost function for affine and nonlinear alignment
inputs.name: Cost Function

inputs.description: Max level for nonlinear warping. Final patch size is determined based on this value.
inputs.name: Maximum Level

inputs.description: Do not make surfaces for atlas regions in native space.
inputs.name: No Surfaces Flag

inputs.description: Set feature size for affine alignment (in mm)
inputs.name: Feature Size

inputs.description: Allow up to 50% size difference between subject and template
inputs.name: Supersize Flag

inputs.description: Approximate length ratio of input to template for initial scaling
inputs.name: Initial Scale

inputs.description: Modal smoothing kernel size in voxels
inputs.name: Modal Smoothing Size

inputs.description: Turn off replacement in modal smoothing
inputs.name: Mode Smooth Replacement Off Flag

inputs.description: Center native-space output to native original space or template space center-shifted
inputs.name: Center Output

inputs.description: Specify level of alignment
inputs.name: Align Type

inputs.description: Additional options to add to existing options for 3dQwarp
inputs.name: Additional 3dQwarp Options

inputs.description: Keep temporary files including awpy directory and other intermediate datasets
inputs.name: Keep Temporary Files Flag

inputs.description: Display the program version
inputs.name: Version Flag

inputs.description: Reuse and do not overwrite existing datasets
inputs.name: OK to Exist Flag

inputs.description: Copy all commands being run into the terminal
inputs.name: Echo Flag

output-files.description: input dataset nonlinearly warped to template
output-files.name: Warp to Standard

output-files.description: initial QC image montage showing overlap of source and base dataset
output-files.name: QC Initial Image Overlap

output-files.description: initial QC image montage after shifting centers of source and base dataset
output-files.name: QC Initial Image Shift

output-files.description: copy(s) of -dset_followers mapped to template space
output-files.name: Dataset Followers Output

output-files.description: copy(s) of -roidset_followers mapped to template space
output-files.name: ROIDSET Followers Output

output-files.description: guide to data in output directory
output-files.name: Animal Outputs Guide
